name: Upstream Again
description:
"Upstream Again" is a puzzle decryption game. As a mechanical creature, the protagonist, in the abandoned world, overcomes all kinds of difficulties and obstacles, keeps advancing and exploring according to the guidance of the mechanical core in the body.

The basic gameplay of the game can be summarized as the decryption gameplay of grid moving type. The core system is the record bar at the bottom of the level, which records the player's movement. The grid on the map is divided into normal area and pulse area. The character can move freely in the normal area. At this time, every movement will be recorded to the bottom. When the character moves to the pulse area, due to the influence of the environment, the character can't control it at this time (that is, the player can't move), and the recording bar at the bottom will be played repeatedly until he gets out of the pulse area, and the recording will be reset at this time.

In the level, players need to actively think about strategies, face various obstacles and reach the destination with limited number of keys. WASD is to move, and R is to restart.

Please run the game with 1080p.
